#How to compile and install Vala Toys for GEdit

== Compiling ==

First at the moment you need vala compiler 0.3.6 - trunk:

{{{
svn checkout http://svn.gnome.org/svn/vala/trunk
}}}

The you need to patch the compiler with the patch included in this bug report:

http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=553926

After that you can compile _Vtg_ with:

{{{
./configure --prefix="your home dir"/.gnome2/gedit/plugins --datadir="your home dir"/.gnome2/gedit/plugins
./make
}}}

== Installing ==

From the root folder of Vtg distribution:

{{{
mkdir ~/.gnome2/gedit/plugins/vtg
cp -r images/ ~/.gnome2/gedit/plugins/vtg/
cp vtg/vtg.gedit-plugin ~/.gnome2/gedit/plugins/
cp vtg/.libs/libvtg.so ~/.gnome2/gedit/plugins/
}}}
